sec.p: The aerial parts of wild Achillea millefolium L. plant were picked in May 2008 at the bloom stage from Toulouse (43°36′01′′ N, 1°25′58′′ E), France. The voucher specimens were deposited in the Herbarium of the Pharmacognosy Laboratory, Faculty of the Pharmaceutical Sciences, Université de Toulouse III, N° (AST. 251 (2008) (I.F.)).
